public class BoardSceneController
extends java.lang.Object

    BoardSceneController()  

  • Method Summary

    Modifier and Type Method Description
    void boxClicked​(javafx.scene.input.MouseEvent event)
    If a GridPane element is clicked, a new Move or Build message is sent with GridPane coordinates
    void femaleButtonClicked()
    On second choice button clicked a boolean choice with false flag is sent to server If is a male or female worker choice, a WorkerChoice message is sent with male flag set false
    void initialize()
    Called when board.fxml is load
    void maleButtonClicked()
    On first choice button clicked a boolean choice with true flag is sent to server If is a male or female worker choice, a WorkerChoice message is sent with male flag set true
    void mouseEnterOnBox​(javafx.scene.input.MouseEvent event)
    If a box can be clicked, when cursor enter on a GridPane element hand cursor and red background is set on that box
    void mouseEnterOnButton​(javafx.scene.input.MouseEvent event)
    When mouse enter on a button hand cursor is set
    void mouseExitFromBox​(javafx.scene.input.MouseEvent event)
    When cursor exit from GridPane element default cursor and no background colour is set
    void mouseExitFromButton​(javafx.scene.input.MouseEvent event)
    When mouse exit from a button default cursor is set
    void setBoardImage​(Box[][] board)
    Set worker and building images on every ImageView in GridPane
    void setBoardScene()
    Set font and text alignment of labels and buttons Set cards images and player names on main game scene Save ImageView references of board GridPane
    void setEndScene​(java.lang.String winnerName)
    Load end_scene.fxml on current stage and set end_scene font
    void setImageCards​(java.util.Vector<java.lang.Integer> cardValues)
    Set ImageView with the image every player's card
    void setLabelNames​(java.util.Vector<java.lang.String> playerNames)
    Set label texts that represent players names
    void setMessageLabel​(java.lang.String message)
    Set main label text used for messages that reference to player's action
    void setWorkerImage​(javafx.scene.image.ImageView boxImageView, Box box)
    Set the image of a worker on an ImageView, using an instance of Box
    void showBuildAgainMessage()
    Set label text and choice buttons text for double build choice Set choice buttons visible
    void showBuildFirstMessage()
    Set label text and choice buttons text for build before move choice Set choice buttons visible
    void showBuildOrDomeMessage()
    Set label text and choice buttons text for build or dome choice Set choice button visible
    void showMaleOrFemaleMessage()
    Set label text and choice buttons text for male or female worker choice Set choice buttons visible
    void showMoveAgainMessage()
    Set label text and choice buttons text for double build choice Set choice buttons visible
